FLAVOUR_SUCCESSMSG_3.message: {target} è morto. Ecco la tua ricompensa.

FLAVOUR_SUCCESSMSG_2.message: Sei stato pagato pienamente per il completamento di quell'importante contratto.

FLAVOUR_SUCCESSMSG_0.message: Le novità sulla lunga vacanza di {target} sono fortunatamente arrivate. Ben fatto, ho già ordinato il tuo pagamento completo.

TARGET_WILL_BE_LEAVING_SPACEPORT_AT.message: Il Bersago lascerà lo spazioporto questa data:

FLAVOUR_SUCCESSMSG_5.message: Il messaggio sulla fune della carriera di {target} è allegramente arrivato. Ecco i tuoi {cash}.

FLAVOUR_SUCCESSMSG_4.message: Le novità sul ritiro di {target} sono deliziose. Ecco i tuoi soldi.

FLAVOUR_SUCCESSMSG_1.message: Sono per lo più triste della scomparsa di {target}. Sei stato pagato del tutto.

FLAVOUR_INTROTEXT_3.message: {target} deve essere ridotto in polvere. Ti ricompenserò con {cash} per  farlo.

FLAVOUR_INTROTEXT_4.message: For {cash} we wish to encourage {target} to stop work permanently.

FLAVOUR_FAILUREMSG_2.message: It is most regrettable that {target} is still live and well. You will receive no payment as you did not complete your contract.

FLAVOUR_ADTEXT_0.message: WANTED: Removal of {target} from the {system} system.

IT_MUST_BE_DONE_AFTER.message: It must be done after {target} leaves {spaceport}. Do not miss this opportunity.

X_WILL_BE_LEAVING.message: {target} will be leaving {spaceport} in the {system} system ({sectorX}, {sectorY}, {sectorZ}), distance {dist} ly, at {date}. The ship is {shipname} and has registration id {shipregid}.

FLAVOUR_FAILUREMSG_0.message: I am most displeased to find that {target} is still alive. Needless to say you will receive no payment.

RETURN_HERE_ON_THE_COMPLETION_OF_THE_CON.message: Torna qui a contratto compiuto e sarai pagato.

FLAVOUR_INTROTEXT_5.message: We wish {target} to have a fitting career end in the {system} system for {cash}.

FLAVOUR_FAILUREMSG2_0.message: {target}'s removal was not done by you. No payment this time.

FLAVOUR_ADTEXT_1.message: WANTED: Someone to kill {target} from the {system} system.

FLAVOUR_INTROTEXT_2.message: I am {name}, and I will pay you {cash} to terminate {target}.

FLAVOUR_INTROTEXT_0.message: Hi, I'm {name}. I'll pay you {cash} to get rid of {target}.

FLAVOUR_INTROTEXT_1.message: I need {target} taken out of the picture. I'll pay you {cash} to do this.

FLAVOUR_ADTEXT_2.message: REMOVAL: {target} is no longer wanted in the {system} system.

FLAVOUR_FAILUREMSG2_4.message: Retirement of {target} was done by someone else.

FLAVOUR_FAILUREMSG2_3.message: Are you asking money for job done by someone else? Get lost.

FLAVOUR_FAILUREMSG2_2.message: Contract was completed by someone else. Be faster next time!

FLAVOUR_FAILUREMSG2_1.message: {target}'s demise was not caused by you, so do not ask for payment.

FLAVOUR_FAILUREMSG_4.message: {target} is still breathing and I'm not giving money to you.

FLAVOUR_FAILUREMSG_5.message: We found out that {target} is nonetheless operative. This saddens us.

COULD_YOU_REPEAT_THE_ORIGINAL_REQUEST.message: Could you repeat the original request?

FLAVOUR_FAILUREMSG_3.message: You will pay for not eliminating {target}!

FLAVOUR_FAILUREMSG_1.message: I hear that {target} is in good health. This pains me.
